channel.title: U-Torrent Listen Error (Port Forwarding)
channel.description:
When i Run my 317 server and then i run
U-Torrent > Option > Preferences > Type 43594 In random Port > Tick all, except randomize Port each start > Appy.
I have done that correctly but A listen Error comes up, down the bottem saying "listen error, you should try and change the listen port.
It means There is already 2 connections running through the same port.
Is this meant to happen? How do i fix? Will Runelocas say its online, once I'm done (I have added my no-ip in the client and gui.java)
~Thanks Loved~

item.title: U-Torrent Listen Error (Port Forwarding)
item.dc:creator: @loved loved
item.description:
@loved wrote:

oh, you sure? then will it work?

Read full topic

item.description:

you can only use port 5555 for rps on utorent
